list.name: Changes
list.comment: 1 - removed getDatabase() method because it was unused 2 - added existing product check in addProductToDb() in DBWriting.java 3 - added profit(), showInfo() and insertRecordInDB() methods in Main class 4 - remove unused import statements

task.summary: My agriculture project using threads. More work to come in future. Stay tuned :)
My agriculture project using threads. More work to come in future. Stay tuned :)
1 - created HashMap to store info 2 - using MicrosoftOffice Excel as database 3 - Options for getting all products info or specific product info 4 - Added new POI dependencies
1- Created seperate class for getting info from Database 2 - Created seperate class for reading info from Database
1- Fixing varies issues and adding different cosmetic features
1 - changed from .xlsx database to Mongodb 2 - made class to read from DB 3 - made class to add info to DB 4 - added special class for DB connection 5 - added special class for creating DBObject
1 - changed from .xlsx database to Mongodb 2 - made class to read from DB 3 - made class to add info to DB 4 - added special class for DB connection 5 - added special class for creating DBObject
1 - created InfoMap class, it is creating and populating map with db info
1 - added new "newCollection" for creating new collection file in MONGODB 2 - added option to read and write info from specific file 3 - added completely functional menu with 4 choices
1 - crated package for connection with mongodb, moved getCollection and newCollection methods in it 2 - added option to check for existing database

1 - made DBConnectionAndCreateCollection.java static and all his methods and fields static as well 2 - created ReadShowCalculate.java class to calculate price and show all objects in HashMap 3 - you can choose product and year to search 4- added various checks for correct program working

1 - Renamed class DBConnection from DBConnectionAndcreatenewCollection 2 - DBConnection class only connects with mongoDB now 3 - Reworked DBWriting class in order to get cleaner and easier to read code 4 - ReadShowCalculate class now seperated in different classes 5 - CalculateProfit only calculates profit via given quantity 6 - Agriculture product has one more field called "year" 7 - Created class DisplayInfo to display information for products with given year 8 - created class CreateHashMap wich returns hashMap with infro from DB 9 - completely reworked Database structure
